title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 227-2.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 227-2.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

The provisions of this Subpart apply to owners and
operators of major facilities of NO
x
that contain any of
the following types of emission sources: (a) very large boilers; (b) large boilers; (c) mid-size boilers; (d) small boilers; (e) combustion turbines; (f) stationary internal combustion engines; and
(g) other combustion
installations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
227-2.1

Amended

New

York State Register November 27, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 48, eff. 12/7/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
